article_title: Government Benefits For Working Poor Are Good For Taxpayers, Not Employers

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: Government benefits collected by low wage workers are not a subsidy to employers but are instead designed to move people from welfare to work, thereby saving taxpayers billions of dollars every year.
og.title: Government Benefits For Working Poor Are Good For Taxpayers, Not Employers
